hero.title: Welcome to Neon Market: Your Vibrant Urban Escape
hero.subtitle: Discover a fresh take on your favorite cafe delights, from artisanal coffees to savory bites. Step into a world of flavor and community.

about.title: About Neon Market: More Than Just a Cafe
about.paragraph1: At Neon Market, we've created a space where culinary passion meets cozy comfort. We believe in serving exceptional coffee, delightful pastries, and fresh, wholesome meals prepared with the finest ingredients. Our mission is to be your go-to spot for a morning boost, a midday escape, or an evening gathering.
about.paragraph2: Every visit to Neon Market is an experience designed to invigorate your senses and nourish your soul. We're proud to be a vibrant hub for our community, fostering connections over delicious food and drinks. Come for the taste, stay for the atmosphere â€“ we can't wait to welcome you.
